Posts.Content: kris529 wrote: Hello.  I am newly diagnosed with Stage 2, Grade 3.  I had a lumpectomy on June 16 and plan to start chemo next week.  The path report described the tumor as poorly differentiated with "neuroendocrine features."  All the doctors that I have met with (both breast surgeon and oncologists) are concerned about the neuroendocrine features aspect.  I am curious to hear from anyone else who had this type of tumor and what, if anything, they have learned about it. Thanks so much!   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Neuroendocrine features kris529 momof3boys
